data.lyric:
[ti:What If I Never Get Over You]
[ar:Lady Antebellum]
[al:What If I Never Get Over You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]What If I Never Get Over You - Lady A (战前女神)
[00:04.39]Lyrics by：Sam Ellis/Jon Green/Ryan Hurd/Laura Veltz
[00:08.79]Composed by：Sam Ellis/Jon Green/Ryan Hurd/Laura Veltz
[00:13.19]It's supposed to hurt it's a broken heart
[00:18.13]But the moving on is the hardest part
[00:23.34]It comes in waves the letting go
[00:28.40]But the memory fades everybody knows everybody knows
[00:37.13]What if I'm trying but then
[00:40.33]I close my eyes and then I'm right back
[00:44.69]Lost in that last goodbye what
[00:47.31]If time doesn't do what it's supposed to do
[00:53.88]What if I never get over you
[00:59.72]Maybe months go by maybe years from now
[01:04.70]And I meet someone and it's working out
[01:09.78]Every now and then he can see right through
[01:14.88]'Cause when I look at him yeah all I see is you
[01:20.94]What if I'm trying but then
[01:24.26]I close my eyes and then I'm right back
[01:28.46]Lost in that last goodbye
[01:31.34]What if time doesn't do what it's supposed to do
[01:37.04]What if I never get over you
[01:45.75]Ooh yeah
[01:50.32]What if I never get over
[01:52.87]What if I never get closure
[01:55.39]What if I never get back
[01:57.65]All the wasted words I told you
[02:00.14]What if it never gets better
[02:02.80]What if this lasts forever and ever and ever I'm tryin'
[02:13.53]But then I close my eyes and then I'm right back
[02:18.94]Lost in that last goodbye
[02:22.03]What if time doesn't do what it's supposed to do
[02:28.09]What if I never get over you
[02:31.87]What if I gave you everything I got
[02:37.02]What if your love was my one and only shot
[02:42.36]What if I end up with nothing to compare it to
[02:48.68]What if I never get over you
[02:51.60]What if I never get over you
[02:53.92]What if I never get over you
[03:01.24]What if I never get over you
[03:06.27]What if I never get over you
data.trans:
[ti:What If I Never Get Over You]
[ar:Lady Antebellum]
[al:What If I Never Get Over You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.39]//
[00:08.79]//
[00:13.19]受伤之后应该是会痛的 这无可厚非 
[00:18.13]但放下过往是最难做到的事情
[00:23.34]痛苦如潮水般侵袭而来 迫使你放手
[00:28.40]但人人都明白 记忆早晚会消散 
[00:37.13]可如果我想尽办法忘记 但
[00:40.33]每当我闭上双眼 一切又翻涌而来
[00:44.69]那最后一声再见 我只觉耳鸣 只觉天旋地转
[00:47.31]如果时间不肯帮忙 没有尽到抚平一切的义务
[00:53.88]可如果我永远没办法忘记你呢
[00:59.72]也许过了几个月 或者过了几年
[01:04.70]我遇见某个人 好像相爱了
[01:09.78]但他早晚总会看明白 
[01:14.88]我看向他的眼神里投射出别人的影子 
[01:20.94]可如果我想尽办法忘记 但
[01:24.26]每当我闭上双眼 一切又翻涌而来
[01:28.46]那最后一声再见 我只觉耳鸣 只觉不知所措
[01:31.34]如果时间不肯帮忙 没有尽到抚平一切的义务
[01:37.04]可如果我永远没办法忘记你呢
[01:45.75]//
[01:50.32]可如果我永远放不下呢
[01:52.87]可如果我永远不能解脱呢
[01:55.39]可如果我永远不能收回
[01:57.65]我对你说过的所有废话 蠢话呢
[02:00.14]可如果我再也好不了了呢
[02:02.80]如果这痛苦永远持续下去怎么办啊
[02:13.53]每当我闭上双眼 一切又翻涌而来
[02:18.94]迷失在那最后一声再见里 
[02:22.03]如果时间不肯帮忙 没有尽到抚平一切的义务
[02:28.09]可如果我永远没办法忘记你呢
[02:31.87]可如果我为你付出了一切 已经一无所有了呢
[02:37.02]可如果你的爱是我唯一的救命稻草呢
[02:42.36]可如果我再也找不到可以取代你的人呢
[02:48.68]可如果我永远没办法忘记你呢
[02:51.60]可如果我永远没办法忘记你呢
[02:53.92]可如果我永远没办法忘记你呢
[03:01.24]可如果我永远没办法忘记你呢
[03:06.27]可如果我永远没办法忘记你呢
